mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission (name, description, url, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{url}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM permission p JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
